Title: olaf
Description: olaf makes it easier for manual qa testers to use selenium web-driver by defining their test case flows in excel spreadsheets.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

olaf is an attempt to make selenium web-driver available to general qa testers without understanding of complex programming knowledge.

olaf stands for orienlabs automation framework. While this is essentially a wrapper around selenium web-driver, it includes rich features such as database validations, implicit frames handling, A/B testing, windows handling, integration to test management tools such as Microsoft Test Manager, xStudio, Quality Center and more in future releases. Execution capabilities are local workstation, remote web-driver or saucelabs cloud hosting.
